title: Final Components - TypeScript
description: Convert final core components, entry points, error classes, and JSON utilities from JavaScript to TypeScript. These are the remaining infrastructure files.

tasks.description: Convert core files: import.js, config.js, typed.js to TypeScript
Convert error classes: ArgumentsError.js, DimensionError.js, IndexError.js to TypeScript
Convert JSON utilities: reviver.js, replacer.js to TypeScript
Convert root entry files: entry/*.js, version.js to TypeScript

acceptanceCriteria: All 24 final component files converted to TypeScript
Import and config system properly typed
Error classes extend Error with proper typing
JSON utilities handle custom types correctly
Entry points properly export all functionality
